Aromatherapy Shower Head: This shower head would have a built-in essential oil dispenser that releases a soothing aroma as the water flows, enhancing relaxation and well-being.
Energy-Efficient Shower Head: This shower head would have a feature that detects when the user is finished showering and automatically turns off the water flow to conserve water.
Self-Cleaning Shower Head: This shower head would have a self-cleaning feature that uses UV light or a built-in filter to keep the nozzle clean and germ-free between uses.
Music and Lighting Shower Head: This shower head would have built-in speakers that play music and ambient lighting that changes color and brightness to create a relaxing and immersive experience.
Water Conservation Shower Head: This shower head would have a feature that limits the water flow based on the user's weight, saving water and reducing water waste.
